H0.text: The Crimea forms part of which country. Russia

H1.text: The Crimea forms part of which country. Turkey

H2.text: The Crimea forms part of which country. Romania

H3.text: The Crimea forms part of which country. UKR

A4.text: Crimea is internationally recognised as part of Ukraine.

A5.text: Crimea is Ukrainian territory currently occupied by Russia; Ukraine has not relinquished title over the Crimean territory since the events of 2014, and Crimea is internationally recognised as part of Ukraine.
